lead_paragraph: Mr. Frémaux’s work offstage during the year, in which he selects the films shown at the festival, makes him one of the most powerful, and scrutinized, figures in the film universe.

headline.print_headline: The Man Who Shapes the Schedule at Cannes
headline.main: Thierry Frémaux Shapes the Cannes Film Festival Schedule

snippet: Mr. Frémaux’s work offstage during the year, in which he selects the films shown at the festival, makes him one of the most powerful, and scrutinized, figures in the film universe.
abstract: Thierry Fremaux describes his job as director of Cannes Film Festival, position he has held since 2007, including his strategies for selecting each year's film mix, dealing with French cultural bureaucracy and zealous filmmakers and handling criticism when a selection is badly received.
